name: Jonas Hartweg
body:
### About me

My name is Jonas Hartweg and I’m a front-end developer from Berlin. I work with JavaScript to build usable, responsive websites and I believe in the mobile web.

I’m available for hire. If you have any vacancies or want to contact me you can write me via [e-mail](mailto:contact@jonas-hartweg.de).

### References

Check out my [GitHub account](https://github.com/johnny353535) for some of the work I've done.

### Contact

You can mail me at [contact@jonas-hartweg.de](mailto:contact@jonas-hartweg.de). I’m also on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=171992234).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
